content:
Hi all, I'm organizing a backroom session on "federated FHIR" at 14hrs, small room 2, titled "Spread like FHIR: towards data and identity federation".

I would like to brainstorm about how to overcome new data silos in the form of FHIR servers and how go (cross-)regional with FHIR. Main topics would be data discovery and aggregation of data from multiple FHIR servers. It looks like a lot is already possible in the FHIR specs, but I would like to gather outside perspectives on the subject. One of the outcomes could be a whitepaper on the approach.
hmm. I missed this until after you started. Still going?
You're certainly welcome - nothing scary so far...
